name: Gargantua
description:
SCHIZOID BAND presents:

GARGANTUA

SIDE A track 2

Album INITIATION

2014

_

Gargantua is a short adventure game about a warrior in search of a potion that will save his beloved from a deep sleep. 

This game tries to explore the possibilities of a simple level design and difficulty curve appropriate to 7 levels.

Time of development: 2 months

  

schizoid band

game by andre teruya eichemberg & Vinicius Sanches dos Santos

music by DANI pe NET - Album SOUNDTRACKS Vol.1

{ www.danipenet.ro } / freesound.org

Time of development: 2 months
